title: Where Markets Go Next in 2026
description: From market volatility to bond opportunities—what’s next for investors in 2026? Joyce Huang, Senior Client Portfolio Manager at American Century Investments, joined Bloomberg TV and radio to share her outlook on Fed policy, equity risks, and why bond yields may still offer attractive income. (Source: Bloomberg)
